name: Galactic Empire
startIntroPart1: It has been revealed that this land has many valuable resources to the empire, and that there might be enemies of the empire being fostered here. You are to investigate, claim the resources for the empire and, if enemies are to be found, destroy them.
startIntroPart2: General: You have been chosen personally to lead the Empire Occupation of this planet, I will be overseeing your progress. Failure will not be tolerated.
declaringWar: Your lack of foresight will be your demise.
attacked: I will show you the power of the Dark Side.
hateHello: I am surprised you still live.
tradeRequest: It would not be wise to enrage my master.

cities.name: Rebel Alliance
cities.startIntroPart1: Greetings. It seems the force has brought us together on this mission. You've been deployed to survey and establish a base in this planet. We have received reports regarding suspicious activity and I am trying to supervise the surroundings. Since we're here anyway feel free to set up a base.
cities.startIntroPart2: Danger is always around the corner, so make sure to be careful. Good luck, and may the force be with you.
cities.declaringWar: You're leaving behind a trail of chaos and destruction, I will have to stop you.
cities.defeated: No way, and I was just getting started...
cities.introduction: Ever been out of a job? I can teach you moisture farming.
cities.hateHello: I can feel the conflict within you.
cities.afterPeace: It's never too late, not even for you.
cities.tradeRequest: It seems the force has brought us together.
uniques: [-50]% Food consumption by specialists [in all cities]
[+33]% Production when constructing [Fighter] units [in all cities]
